items.title: Anheuser-Busch’s CEO asks for beer brands to be labelled ‘American’ not ‘domestic’
items.description: Brendan Whitworth, U.S. CEO of Anheuser-Busch, wants to make the marketing change in order to reflect the pride of the brand.

items.title: A small Alaska plane carrying 10 people has gone missing. It’s the third major U.S. aviation incident in the last 8 days
items.description: Nome, a Gold Rush town, is known as the ending point of the 1,000-mile Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race.

items.title: H-1B visa debates roil U.S.-India relations ahead of Trump-Modi meeting. Here’s what needs to change—on both sides
items.description: Can "Made in the USA" and "Make in India" coexist? Protectionist policies from each side are hindering progress.

items.title: 7 micro habits one woman in early menopause used to lose 50 pounds
items.description: After noticing she was gaining weight in early menopause, Michelle Kloese took her health into her own hands to keep the weight off.

items.title: NYC just shut down all its live bird markets for a week after it discovered seven cases of avian flu
items.description: Bird flu was found in poultry during routine inspections in the Bronx, Brooklyn and Queens.
